attributes.action: Change the legal driving age to 16.
attributes.additional_details: I think the government should change the legal driving age to 16 as this is when most people are going to college and they have to get busses/walk to college which can cost a lot of money overtime and driving would help. Also most people around 16 want more freedom
attributes.background: The government to change the legal driving age to 16.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for the same action:

Change the age to get a full car drivers licence to 16 years:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643332

Lower The Legal Driving Age To 16:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640201
